verses.verse: 'Now in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> on the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> you shall also have <S%H1961><s%> a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation; <S%H4744><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> laborious <S%H5656><s%> work. <S%H4399><s%> It will be to you a day <S%H3117><s%> for blowing <S%H8643><s%> trumpets. <S%H8643><s%>

'And you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> as a soothing <S%H5207><s%> aroma <S%H7381><s%> to the Lord: <S%H3068><s%> one <S%H259><s%> bull <S%H6499><s%>, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> one <S%H259><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%> [and] seven <S%H7651><s%> male <S%H3532><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> one year <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> defect; <S%H8549><s%>

also their grain offering, <S%H4503><s%> fine <S%H5560><s%> flour <S%H5560><s%> mixed <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> three-tenths [of an ephah] for the bull, <S%H6499><s%> two-tenths for the ram, <S%H352><s%>
and one-tenth for each <S%H259><s%> of the seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs. <S%H3532><s%>
'And [offer] one <S%H259><s%> male <S%H8163><s%> goat <S%H5795><s%> for a sin <S%H9128><s%> offering, <S%H9128><s%> to make <S%H3722><s%> atonement <S%H3722><s%> for you,

besides <S%H4480><s%> <S%H905><s%> the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> of the new <S%H2320><s%> moon, <S%H2320><s%> and its grain offering, <S%H4503><s%> and the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> and its grain offering, <S%H4503><s%> and their libations, <S%H5262><s%> according to their ordinance, <S%H4941><s%> for a soothing <S%H5207><s%> aroma, <S%H7381><s%> an offering <S%H801><s%> by fire <S%H801><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

'Then on the tenth <S%H6218><s%> day of this <S%H2088><s%> seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> you shall have <S%H1961><s%> a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation, <S%H4744><s%> and you shall humble <S%H6031><s%> yourselves; <S%H5315><s%> you shall not do <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> work. <S%H4399><s%>

'And you shall present <S%H7126><s%> a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> [as] a soothing <S%H5207><s%> aroma: <S%H7381><s%> one <S%H259><s%> bull <S%H6499><s%>, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> one <S%H259><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> male <S%H3532><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> one year <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> having <S%H1961><s%> them without <S%H8549><s%> defect; <S%H8549><s%>

and their grain offering, <S%H4503><s%> fine <S%H5560><s%> flour <S%H5560><s%> mixed <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> three-tenths [of an] [ephah] for the bull, <S%H6499><s%> two-tenths for the one <S%H259><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%>
a tenth <S%H6241><s%> for each <S%H259><s%> of the seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs; <S%H3532><s%>

one <S%H259><s%> male <S%H8163><s%> goat <S%H5795><s%> for a sin <S%H9128><s%> offering, <S%H9128><s%> besides <S%H4480><s%> <S%H905><s%> the sin <S%H9128><s%> offering <S%H9128><s%> of atonement <S%H3725><s%> and the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> and its grain offering, <S%H4503><s%> and their libations. <S%H5262><s%>

'Then on the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> you shall have <S%H1961><s%> a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation; <S%H4744><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> laborious <S%H5656><s%> work, <S%H4399><s%> and you shall observe <S%H2287><s%> a feast <S%H2282><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> for seven <S%H7651><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

'And you shall present <S%H7126><s%> a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H5930><s%> an offering <S%H801><s%> by fire <S%H801><s%> as a soothing <S%H5207><s%> aroma <S%H7381><s%> to the Lord: <S%H3068><s%> thirteen <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> bulls <S%H6499><s%>, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> male <S%H3532><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> one year <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> which are without <S%H8549><s%> defect, <S%H8549><s%>

and their grain offering, <S%H4503><s%> fine <S%H5560><s%> flour <S%H5560><s%> mixed <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> three-tenths [of an ephah] for each <S%H259><s%> of the thirteen <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> bulls, <S%H6499><s%> two-tenths <S%H8147><s%> for each <S%H259><s%> of the two rams, <S%H352><s%>
and a tenth <S%H6241><s%> for each <S%H259><s%> of the fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> lambs; <S%H3532><s%>

and one <S%H259><s%> male <S%H8163><s%> goat <S%H5795><s%> for a sin <S%H9128><s%> offering, <S%H9128><s%> besides <S%H4480><s%> <S%H905><s%> the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H5930><s%> its grain offering <S%H4503><s%> and its libation. <S%H5262><s%>

'Then on the second <S%H8145><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> bulls <S%H6499><s%>, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> male <S%H3532><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> one year <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> defect; <S%H8549><s%>

and their grain offering <S%H4503><s%> and their libations <S%H5262><s%> for the bulls, <S%H6499><s%> for the rams <S%H352><s%> and for the lambs, <S%H3532><s%> by their number <S%H4557><s%> according to the ordinance; <S%H4941><s%>

and one <S%H259><s%> male <S%H8163><s%> goat <S%H5795><s%> for a sin <S%H9128><s%> offering, <S%H9128><s%> besides <S%H4480><s%> <S%H905><s%> the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> and its grain offering, <S%H4503><s%> and their libations. <S%H5262><s%>

'Then on the third <S%H7992><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> eleven <S%H6249><s%> <S%H6240><s%> bulls, <S%H6499><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> male <S%H3532><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> one year <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> defect; <S%H8549><s%>

and their grain offering <S%H4503><s%> and their libations <S%H5262><s%> for the bulls, <S%H6499><s%> for the rams <S%H352><s%> and for the lambs, <S%H3532><s%> by their number <S%H4557><s%> according to the ordinance; <S%H4941><s%>

and one <S%H259><s%> male <S%H8163><s%> goat <S%H8163><s%> for a sin <S%H9128><s%> offering, <S%H9128><s%> besides <S%H4480><s%> <S%H905><s%> the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> and its grain offering <S%H4503><s%> and its libation. <S%H5262><s%>

'Then on the fourth <S%H7243><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> bulls, <S%H6499><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> male <S%H3532><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> one year <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> defect; <S%H8549><s%>

their grain offering <S%H4503><s%> and their libations <S%H5262><s%> for the bulls, <S%H6499><s%> for the rams <S%H352><s%> and for the lambs, <S%H3532><s%> by their number <S%H4557><s%> according to the ordinance; <S%H4941><s%>

and one <S%H259><s%> male <S%H8163><s%> goat <S%H5795><s%> for a sin <S%H9128><s%> offering, <S%H9128><s%> besides <S%H4480><s%> <S%H905><s%> the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H5930><s%> its grain offering <S%H4503><s%> and its libation. <S%H5262><s%>

'Then on the fifth <S%H2549><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> nine <S%H8672><s%> bulls, <S%H6499><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> male <S%H3532><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> one year <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> defect; <S%H8549><s%>

and their grain offering <S%H4503><s%> and their libations <S%H5262><s%> for the bulls, <S%H6499><s%> for the rams <S%H352><s%> and for the lambs, <S%H3532><s%> by their number <S%H4557><s%> according to the ordinance; <S%H4941><s%>

and one <S%H259><s%> male <S%H8163><s%> goat <S%H8163><s%> for a sin <S%H9128><s%> offering, <S%H9128><s%> besides <S%H4480><s%> <S%H905><s%> the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> and its grain offering <S%H4503><s%> and its libation. <S%H5262><s%>

'Then on the sixth <S%H8345><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> bulls, <S%H6499><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> male <S%H3532><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> one year <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> defect; <S%H8549><s%>

and their grain offering <S%H4503><s%> and their libations <S%H5262><s%> for the bulls, <S%H6499><s%> for the rams <S%H352><s%> and for the lambs, <S%H3532><s%> by their number <S%H4557><s%> according to the ordinance; <S%H4941><s%>

and one <S%H259><s%> male <S%H8163><s%> goat <S%H8163><s%> for a sin <S%H9128><s%> offering, <S%H9128><s%> besides <S%H4480><s%> <S%H905><s%> the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H5930><s%> its grain offering <S%H4503><s%> and its libations. <S%H5262><s%>

'Then on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> bulls, <S%H6499><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> male <S%H3532><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> one year <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> defect; <S%H8549><s%>

and their grain offering <S%H4503><s%> and their libations <S%H5262><s%> for the bulls, <S%H6499><s%> for the rams <S%H352><s%> and for the lambs, <S%H3532><s%> by their number <S%H4557><s%> according to the ordinance; <S%H4941><s%>

and one <S%H259><s%> male <S%H8163><s%> goat <S%H8163><s%> for a sin <S%H9128><s%> offering, <S%H9128><s%> besides <S%H4480><s%> <S%H905><s%> the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H5930><s%> its grain offering <S%H4503><s%> and its libation. <S%H5262><s%>

'On the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> you shall have <S%H1961><s%> a solemn <S%H6116><s%> assembly; <S%H6116><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> laborious <S%H5656><s%> work. <S%H4399><s%>

'But you shall present <S%H7126><s%> a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H5930><s%> an offering <S%H801><s%> by fire, <S%H801><s%> as a soothing <S%H5207><s%> aroma <S%H7381><s%> to the Lord: <S%H3068><s%> one <S%H259><s%> bull, <S%H6499><s%> one <S%H259><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> male <S%H3532><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> one year <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> defect; <S%H8549><s%>

their grain offering <S%H4503><s%> and their libations <S%H5262><s%> for the bull, <S%H6499><s%> for the ram <S%H352><s%> and for the lambs, <S%H3532><s%> by their number <S%H4557><s%> according to the ordinance; <S%H4941><s%>

and one <S%H259><s%> male <S%H8163><s%> goat <S%H8163><s%> for a sin <S%H9128><s%> offering, <S%H9128><s%> besides <S%H4480><s%> <S%H905><s%> the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> and its grain offering <S%H4503><s%> and its libation. <S%H5262><s%>

'You shall present <S%H6213><s%> these <S%H428><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> at your appointed <S%H4150><s%> times, <S%H4150><s%> besides <S%H905><s%> <S%H4480><s%> your votive <S%H5088><s%> offerings <S%H5088><s%> and your freewill <S%H5071><s%> offerings, <S%H5071><s%> for your burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings <S%H5930><s%> and for your grain offerings <S%H4503><s%> and for your libations <S%H5262><s%> and for your peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings. <S%H8002><s%>' "

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in accordance with all <S%H3605><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
